text: Aduga mahakna Jisugi makhong mayada tunglomda lepladuna hikna hikna kapcharammi. Amasung sintharakliba mahakki pirang aduna Ibungogi makhong adu chothallammi. Adudagi mahakna phamtharaduna Ibungogi makhong adu mahakki masamna theithokcharammi amasung Ibungogi makhong adu chupladuna manam nungsiba thao adu teirammi.
